name: Ice Score
description:
Controls:
Arrows / WASD for movement, Space for dash

You play as a fire boy in winter wastelands. Keep your slelf warm or you will run out of energy. The only safe place is your score made of ice! Stay away from snow and snowballs. Use your dash wisely. If you reach score 100, the game ends. But it is not easy, the snowballs fall more often the higher score you have.

This game was made for Mini Jam 124: Warmth. The limitation was: Your score serves a purpose.

All art was made by myself.
Music:
Kevin MacLeod - Hot Pursuit, Almost New
SFX:
https://freesound.org/
